release.description: This is a maintenance release. The main change is addition of equalsIee754 to points in all topologies to handle NaN coordinates.
release.action: Fixed wrong set operation with ArcsSet when two BSP trees share the same angle as a cut hyperplane.

Added equalsIee754 to S1Point, S2Point, Vector1D, Vector2D and Vector3D to have an equality method consistent with IEEE754 concerning NaN coordinates, in addition to the regular equals method compliant with Java language design choices, including Double.equals (which is different from the double == operator).

release.description: This is a major release. The only changes are removal of deprecated methods.
release.action: Removed methods and constants deprecated during the 1.x series. Github: fixes #120.
No changes directly in this module. However, lower level Hipparchus modules did change, hence a new release was needed.

release.description: This is a maintenance release. The only changes are addition of Line.fromDirection(...) and changed RotationOrder from final class to enum.
release.action: Add Line.fromDirection(...).
Changed RotationOrder from final class to enum.

release.description: This is a maintenance release. The only change is addition of a field version of Vector2D.
release.action: Added field version of Vector2D.

release.description: This is a maintenance release, it includes only bug fixes.
release.action: Fixed lines/polyhedrons intersection occurring on facets boundaries. This was ported from Apache Commons Geometry issue 38.

release.description: This is a maintenance release. The main changes since last version are various fixes in partitioning.
release.action: Fixed creating a SphericalPolygonsSet from oversampled or noisy data.
Fixed 2D outline extraction from 3D polyhedrons sets with holes. GitHub: fixes #45.
Use topological information from BSP tree to connect more reliably edges and vertices when building the boundary loops of SphericalPolygonsSet. GitHub: fixes #42.
Forbid use of unrealistic tolerances (below ulp(2Ï€)) in spherical geometry. GitHub: fixes #42.
Fixed a corner case in BSPTree split. GitHub: fixes #41.
No changes directly in this module. However, lower level Hipparchus modules did change, hence a new release was needed.
Added a method to compute the orientation of a triplet of points in 2D.
Added a getBRep method to PolyhedronsSet to extract a Boundary REPresentation in regular cases (unbounded PolyhedronsSet or PolyhedronsSet with holes in their boundary are not supported).
Fixed NullPointerException when computing size of unbounded polygons sets.
Fixed polygons creation from lists of vertices (both in Euclidean and spherical geometry) when separate edges share the same hyperplane (line or circle) but with different orientations.
Fixed numerical noise issues in Welzl smallest enclosing ball computation. Thanks to jerdmanGH for reporting the issue. GitHub: fixes #20.
Added field based 3D lines.
Added utility methods for field-based rotations and 3D vectors.

release.description: This is the first release of the library
release.action: Modularized the library.
